posts.title: My First Blog Post
posts.excerpt: A test post for this website
content: This is a test post to display the functionality of this section of the website.
I plan to use this blog to document my plans, and to share some of my thoughts on the projects I'm working on.
On the side here are some of the early and current versions of the mascots I concepted for my online persona.

posts.title: Test Post #1
content: This post doesn't have anything of substance to say. It's really only here to display the functionality of this website.
Maybe try taking a look around somewhere else?

posts.title: Test Post #2
content: This post is also here to display the functionality of this website.
I'm not sure what else to say, so I'll just leave it at that.
